data.name: SCP: Keter
data.detailed_description:
Based on the SCP Foundation "Keter" is a combination of Tactical Multiplayer FPS paired with Dead by Daylight and Left4Dead-inspired Game mechanics.

Every Screenshot or Video is captured in real-time Gameplay





Mobile Task Force vs SCP Subjects

4 MTF Players fight or flee against the SCP played by another Player.

A multiplayer (4vs1) horror survival Match where one player takes on the role of an SCP, and the other four players play as MTF Members, trying to escape with the use of Lethal force or Stealth by reactivating the Escapesystem. No Round will be identical to the other, due to randomly placed Objectives and environmental opportunities.



Containment

Mobile Task Force Players vs Chaos Insurgency Players

Hunt the SCP (AI) down and capture it to fulfill the mission. Both sides fight against each other to contain the SCP in an open Map where tactical behavior is key to success. Once the SCP is found, the Team needs to weaken it and contain to evacuate it via the Air-Extraction system. Which should be interrupted by the enemy Team at any cost.



K Class Scenario

 (Singleplayer and Co-op)

1 to 4 MTS Player VS SCP AI
Tactical clearance of an SCP Outbreak inflicted by a D Class Personel which stole the SCP 5000. Fight your way through destroyed Buildings filled with escaped SCPs to the Extraction Zone. The main target is to contain SCP 5000 by following his marks of destruction. Every Match will differ from escaped SCPs and Marks to the other one due to Skill-based Player Levels.



Features:
Realistic weapons and Handling
3D Radar system
High-End Graphics digital scaled for lower-end PCs.
Hosting own lobbies
Perks to unlock
Tactical equipment to unlock
Active development with Discord server for new SCP Suggestions
Custom Keybindings
Custom Skins to unlock
and more coming soon

Confirmed SCPS:
SCP-682
SCP-096
SCP-2761
SCP-5000
more to come...

The release will be in early access with several changes during the Development process.

Visual Software Support
NVIDIA® DLSS and Reflex Support
AMD® FidelityFX Super-Resolution (FSR)
Ultra-wide support
DLSS and Fidelity are scalable by the Player.
Will be Updated to Unreal Engine 5 as soon as possible

data.short_description: Based on the SCP Foundation "SCP: Keter" is a combination of Tactical Multiplayer FPS paired with Dead by Daylight and Left 4 Dead-inspired Game mechanics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, Geforce GT 710 / Radeon R7240
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages, or may not be save for viewing at work. Frequent Violence or Gore.
